content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future. However, other teams in Serie A will certainly be looking to close the gap on Juventus. They will have to work harder and invest more in their teams to compete with them. It is worth noting that even though Juventus has a significant advantage with the signing of Ronaldo, football is unpredictable, and anything can happen on the pitch. Other teams can still create a solid game plan, find the right squad and tactics to challenge Juventus. Hence, the possibility of other teams catching up is very much there if they are willing to put in the work and effort required.
